  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.optimize.solvers.BaseOptimizer

    java.io.Serializable, ConvexOptimizer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConjugateGradient, GradientAscent, IterationGradientDescent, LBFGS, StochasticHessianFree

extends java.lang.Object
implements ConvexOptimizer
    Base optimizer
